channel.title: CVE Feed for QNAP Systems Inc. -- Helpdesk
channel.description: The latest CVEs for QNAP Systems Inc. -- Helpdesk

item.title: CVE-2020-2500|2024-08-04T07:09:54.662Z -- qnap%20systems%20inc. -- helpdesk
item.description: This improper access control vulnerability in Helpdesk allows attackers to get control of QNAP Kayako service. Attackers can access the sensitive data on QNAP Kayako server with API keys. We have replaced the API key to mitigate the vulnerability, and already fixed the issue in Helpdesk 3.0.1 and later versions.

item.title: CVE-2020-2506|2024-08-04T07:09:54.611Z -- qnap%20systems%20inc. -- helpdesk
item.description: The vulnerability have been reported to affect earlier versions of QTS. If exploited, this improper access control vulnerability could allow attackers to compromise the security of the software by gaining privileges, or reading sensitive information. This issue affects: QNAP Systems Inc. Helpdesk versions prior to 3.0.3.

item.title: CVE-2020-2507|2024-08-04T07:09:54.670Z -- qnap%20systems%20inc. -- helpdesk
item.description: The vulnerability have been reported to affect earlier versions of QTS. If exploited, this command injection vulnerability could allow remote attackers to run arbitrary commands. This issue affects: QNAP Systems Inc. Helpdesk versions prior to 3.0.3.
